title: Front - End Developer
location: Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bengaluru
roleOverview: Job description  We re seeking enthusiastic, early-career Front-End Developers to join our growing team. You ll work alongside experienced developers, contributing to the development and enhancement of our web and mobile applications. Your curiosity and eagerness to learn will be key as you dive into a variety of technologies and expand your skillset.     Responsibilities     Collaborate with design and development teams to create engaging and user-friendly interfaces.     Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code in React, Node.js, and potentially other front-end frameworks.     Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and share knowledge.     Learn and apply new technologies to enhance our applications.     Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in front-end development.     Qualifications     Bachelor s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience.     0-3 years of experience with front-end technologies (React, Angular, Vue.js, etc.).     Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.     Basic understanding of back-end technologies (Node.js, C#, VB.Net, etc.) is a plus, but not required.     A strong desire to learn, grow, and collaborate in a team environment.     Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.     Nice to Have     Experience with Power Apps or similar low-code platforms.     Familiarity with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.     Contributions to open source projects or personal coding portfolio.   Role: Software Development - Other,Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting,Department: Engineering - Software & QA,Employment Type: Full Time, PermanentRole Category: Software DevelopmentEducationUG: Any GraduatePG: Any PostgraduateKey SkillsComputer scienceBasicBackendFront endVB.NETCodingJavascriptHTMLMobile applicationsOpen source

title: Frontend Developer
roleOverview: Job description  We are seeking enthusiastic and motivated individuals with a passion for frontend development to join our team. As a Frontend Developer, you will collaborate with our experienced team to design and implement user-friendly interfaces for web applications, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience across various platforms and devices.          Responsibilities:     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.   Develop responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.   Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability.   Implement best practices for frontend development and ensure code quality.   Stay updated on emerging technologies and trends in frontend development.     Requirements:     Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (B.Tech, BCA, BSc, MCA, M.Tech, or equivalent).   Strong understanding of web development fundamentals (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript).   Familiarity with frontend frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js is a plus.   Ability to work in a collaborative team environment and communicate effectively.   Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies.     Benefits:     Opportunity to work on exciting projects and gain hands-on experience in frontend development.   Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals in the industry.   Competitive salary and benefits package.   Career growth opportunities within the company   Role: Software Development - Other,Industry Type: Internet,Department: Engineering - Software & QA,Employment Type: Full Time, PermanentRole Category: Software DevelopmentEducationUG: B.Sc in Any Specialization, Any Graduate, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, BCA in ComputersPG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Any SpecializationKey SkillsFront endScalabilityhtml5ShapingWeb developmentJavascriptHTMLInformation technologyCSS3

title: Frontend developers
roleOverview: Job description As a frontend developer at astech you will be responsible for converting designs provided by our awesome clients into cross-browser and responsive html/css and then integrating that design to a functional angular app.    You ll also be responsible for integrating and writing the javascript that powers the design. You should be great at building web pages from scratch.    Knowledge of jQuery, Git, the bootstrap framework, Angular and wordpress will be preferred.  Role: Back End Developer,Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting,Department: Engineering - Software & QA,Employment Type: Full Time, PermanentRole Category: Software DevelopmentEducationUG: Any GraduatePG: Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsCSSjQueryFront endGITWeb technologiesWordpressJavascriptHTMLbootstrap
